Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I was able to get a quicker response using genAi which helped in late summations or when teacher was absent

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I felt the same about the feedback but I guess the GenAi was more direct and the teachers was more broad
